body.p: These are the settings that configure the SWX Integration in ETO, available in ETO 1.0 and above. There is a description of what they do, the recommended setting for most users, along with how to “tune” them, if it applies.

These settings can be configured via the Options Dialog, on the Additional Settings tab, or in the ETO.ini file. The ETO.ini file is found in:
C:\ProgramData\ETO\yourCurrentETOVersionNumber
(for example) C:\ProgramData\ETO\10.2.0

These settings are all per-profile in the ETO.ini file - the start of each profile’s entries in the ETO.ini file is designated by:[Profile~Development_440_Local] RebuildCount=15 RefreshTime=15 RefreshSWX=2 SwxReparent=2 RemoteSWXRelease=2 RemoteSWXTime=2
Please contact our support team, if you have any questions regarding these settings.
